thread.title: Cental Texas businesses collecting donations for Texans affected wildfires in panhandle
thread.title_full: Cental Texas businesses collecting donations for Texans affected wildfires in panhandle

author: @kwtx
title: Cental Texas businesses collecting donations for Texans affected wildfires in panhandle
text: Cental Texas businesses collecting donations for Texans affected wildfires in panhandle Texas (KWTX) - As first responders all over Texas fight the fires in the panhandle, businesses in central Texas are stepping up to help those who have lost everything. The Rockin H4 Enterprise is a ranch equipment store that is opening their doors for donations. Kylie Henderson says that their family business is accepting non-perishable items, water, gift cards and supplies that will help ranchers rebuild after the smoke has cleared. Other businesses are open to shop for donations that will be sent to the panhandle this Saturday. The Falls Farm and Auto store in Lott has tools and supplies for construction that can be donated after purchased. Ten minutes down the road, the Rosebud feed and grain storefront has all types of seed, hay, and feed for cattle and animals that you can buy. Owner Delores Zipperlen says the agricultural community in Central Texas should do whatever they can to help fellow ranchers across Texas. The donations in Lott and Rosebud will be delivered by Clayton Baker on Saturday. Locations for donations include: Rockin H4 Enterprises Address: 189 Mid Tex Rd. Lorena, TX 76655 Hours: 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM Accepting: - Water - Feed - Fencing Supplies - Toiletries - Canned Goods/Non-Perishable Items - Gift Cards - Gas Cards Contact: (254)722-2213 Rosebud Feed and Grain Address: 401 N 5th St, Rosebud, TX 76570 Hours: 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM Accepting: Farming and feed store purchases and monetary donations Contact: 254-583-7944 Falls Farm and Auto Supply Address: 120 Gassaway Ave, Lott, TX 76656 Hours: Monday to Friday 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM Accepting: Hardware Store Purchases Contact: 254-584-4600 Clayton Baker: 254-760-8873 If you have information on a donation site, please contact [jessica.rajkumar@kwtx.com](mailto:jessica.rajkumar@kwtx.com) Copyright 2024 KWTX. All rights reserved.
